channel.title: Critical Making in Digital History
channel.description: Recent content on Critical Making in Digital History

item.title: Welcome
item.description:
You have found Critical Making in Digital History, HIST3812 Winter 2018 at Carleton University.

Start Here. WARNING: syllabus under development, subject to change.

item.title: Core Concepts
item.description: This page introduces the core philosophical concepts I wish to teach you, and includes details on the readings, the collaborative web annotation framework we’re using, and the various policies in place for this course.

item.title: Assessment
item.description: This course is divided into four modules. Each module is worth 20% of the final grade. The final piece you will make is also, in toto, worth 20%.

item.title: Schedule
item.description: This course runs in the Winter term, 2018. Not a student at Carleton U? Why not follow along!
